title: Sons.of.Anarchy.S07E02.Toil.and.Till.720p.WEB-DL.2CH.x265.HEVC-P
description:
Sons.of.Anarchy.S07E02.Toil.and.Till.720p.WEB-DL.2CH.x265.HEVC-PSA

This Release is ReEncoded using next-generation video format/codec x265. it's one of the best and more advanced than current popular format x264. It also named HEVC which stands for High-Efficient Video Codec.
if you want to play this smoothly, you need to use a device/PC with at least dual-core processor. 
You have to update your player to latest version. Also if you use your PC to watch it, installing LAV Filter will help you a lot if you want to use KMPlayer or PotPlayer. Many players have native support for the codec, live MPC-HC(free) or PowerDVD 14(paid).
Anyway, there's a video samples so you can download, check the quality and check if you can play it or not. it's very easy though. believe me, this format will be so popular in one or two years so you have to deal with it anyway.
